name: Gear Fidget Toy
description:
Gear Fidget Toy 🤜🤛 Elden Ring, God of War, Stray

Which is GOTY? I know my pick.

Does Elden Ring even have gears? Does Stray let you change the number of teeth in your cat? Does God of War let you spin on your own axis? Do *any* of them run effortlessly in your browser?

We are all gears, deep down. Deep, deep down.  

Read up about the making of here: https://shahzeb97.github.io/2022-11-14-gear-toy/
